name: claude-squad
description: Multi-agent orchestration system that transforms solo developers into AI-powered development teams

scripts.build:exe:all: bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/squad-darwin-arm64 --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --minify && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/squad-darwin-x64 --target=bun-darwin-x64 --minify && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/squad-linux-x64 --target=bun-linux-x64 --minify && bun build src/cli/index.ts --compile --outfile bin/squad-windows-x64.exe --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify
